**Tender Title:** Regional Fire Alarm and Life Safety Testing and Inspections
**Announcement ID:** cb-140-8662478

**Tender Details:**
- **Solicitation Number:** 21801-23-0147
- **Publication Date:** 2024-01-17
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-22T17:00:00 (Tender has been cancelled, please refer to tender cancelation notice for more information)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-02-28
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 2029-02-27

**Procurement Information:**
The Correctional Service Canada is soliciting a contractor for the provision of regional fire alarm and life safety testing and inspections at various Correctional Service of Canada Institutions in the Fraser Valley region of British Columbia.

The contractor will be responsible for testing, inspecting, and certifying fire alarm and fire protection systems, as well as providing full coverage maintenance services. The contractor must perform tests, inspections, and maintenance in accordance with national and international standards, including the National Fire Code of Canada (2020), National Building Code of Canada (2020), and National Fire Protection Association (NFPA) standards.

The work will be performed in accordance with the Statement of Work, which includes a detailed description of the services to be provided, including annual and semi-annual testing, external examinations, and maintenance.

**Trade Agreements:**
The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) as well as other trade agreements with Chile, Colombia, Honduras, Panama, and Peru.

**Set-Aside Clause:**
This procurement is not subject to any set-asides for Indigenous Suppliers.

**Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement:**
This procurement is not subject to a Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement.

**Security Requirements:**
This contract does not include security requirements.

**Scheduling Information:**
The contract duration is 5 years, commencing on 2024-02-28 and ending on 2029-02-27. Bidders will need to refer to the contract documents for specific details on the duration and scheduling of the work.
